SELECT y_dshouquan.*,y_user.`name` AS username,y_patient.`name` AS doctorname,y_report.report_id as report_id FROM y_dshouquan INNER JOIN y_report ON(y_report.id=y_dshouquan.rid) INNER JOIN y_patient ON(y_report.uid=y_patient.uid) INNER JOIN y_user ON(y_user.id=y_dshouquan.to_who) WHERE y_dshouquan.`status`=1 AND y_dshouquan.uid IN( SELECT id FROM y_user WHERE id=#{id} OR pid=#{id})
AND y_dshouquan.endtime>NOW()
AND NOW()>y_dshouquan.endtime
